title: Chef Arnold’s Ultimate Chicken Adobo
imageAttribution: Image courtesy of unsplash.com / Lefteris kallergis

transcript.text: Hey Mix & Munch fam! Chef Arnold here with my ultimate adobo secrets.
We’ll render chicken fat first – that’s your liquid gold base.
Garlic trio: crushed, minced, and fried chips for layered aroma.
Deglaze with cane vinegar and calamansi, never stir until boil breaks.
Finish with coconut milk for velvet glaze – trust the process.

extractedRecipe.title: Chef Arnold’s Velvet Chicken Adobo
steps: Render chicken fat and crisp skin.
Toast garlic in three textures for layered aroma.
Deglaze with soy, vinegar, and calamansi; simmer until glossy.
Finish with coconut milk and baste constantly for shine.
